text: A prodigal son wasted his wealth and only had one cloak left. Suddenly he saw a swallow that had overtaken the station. Thinking that spring was coming, and that he would no longer need the cloak, he went to sell it as well. But the bad weather came back and the air got colder. Then, as he walked, he found the swallow dead of cold. - That's too bad! "You've hurt us both at the same time". A swallow doesn't make a summer.
title: La golondrina y el hijo pródigo
author: nan Esopo
